titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain chemicals used in the formulation of an HIV Protease Inhibitor.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 8/2/1996--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through March 30, 1997, the duty on certain chemicals used in the formulation of an HIV protease inhibitor.
